summary: Growth represents a journey of self-improvement and strategic development. In this context, it includes aligning personal strengths and weaknesses, conducting SWOT analyses for startups, formulating strategic asks, and embracing resilience. It combines personal and professional development with networking and strategic planning to guide individuals and startups towards achieving their full potential.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves a journey of growth and strategic planning. Discovering personal strengths builds confidence and direction. Embracing weaknesses fosters resilience and self-awareness.
